events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on a busy intersection resulting in moderate damage to their car.
The incident has been categorized under Auto Accident following the review of the initial claim details submitted.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's case and coordinate next steps.
The claim has been acknowledged and the customer was informed that their case is being processed promptly.
Request sent to customer for photos of the damaged vehicle and a copy of the police accident report.
Customer submitted all required documents, including police report and images showing the extent of the vehicle damage.
Investigation into the cause of the collision and liability determination has begun by claims adjustment team.
The investigation was completed with clear evidence supporting the claimant's report of the auto accident.
A settlement proposal has been issued covering repairs and associated costs for the vehicle damage sustained.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the promptness and fairness of the settlement proposal offered.
Based on positive feedback and investigation results, the claim has been approved for payment.
Payment for the approved claim was issued to the customer's bank account to cover vehicle repairs.
The claim was officially closed after payment confirmation with no further issues raised by the customer.
The completed claim documents and correspondence have been archived for future reference and compliance.
